name: WPC Variations Table for WooCommerce
author: WPClever

sections.description:
Table layout for products has always been a fav for WooCommerce sites. The brand new WPC Variations Table for WooCommerce plugin is a perfect choice for your use. It replaces the drop-down for variations of variable products and coats your products with a nice, stunning table layout.

What WPC Variations Table brings to your site:

  • Offer a charming, neat presentation of variations
  • Enhance the user experience & shopping flow
  • An easier way to introduce large variable products

Live demo

Visit our live demo here to see how this plugin works.

Features

  • Setting an active status for all variable products across your store
  • Show/hide out-of-stock/unpurchasable variations from the list of choices
  • Scrolling vertically/horizontally when the number of variations is large
  • Define variation name format – default, with/without attribute labels
  • Show/hide variation details: price, thumbnail, stock, description
  • Separate quantity selectors per variations
  • Separate Add to Cart buttons per variations
  • Compatible with other WPC plugins: WPC AJAX Add to Cart & WPC Added to Cart Notification
  • Customize variation table at product basis (Premium version only)

Wanna save your precious time working on variations? Try our brand-new free plugin WPC Variation Bulk Editor and WPC Variation Duplicator.

Perfect match with WPC plugins

When using with WPC AJAX Add to Cart and WPC Added to Cart Notification plugins, WPC Variations Table can expose its maximum strength. AJAX Add to Cart helps deliver the chosen variation to the cart fast and properly without the need to reload the whole page to see the changes.

Plus, WPC Added to Cart Notification notifies customers about which have been added and prompt them with the next actions: View Cart or Continue Shopping. These complete the shopping circle for variable products on your site.

Other alternatives you might also like

  • WPC Variation Swatches
  • WPC Variations Radio Buttons
  • WPC Show Single Variations
  • WPC Linked Variation
  • WPC Smart Quick View
  • WPC Additional Variation Images
sections.installation:
1. Please make sure that you installed WooCommerce
  2. Go to plugins in your dashboard and select “Add New”
  3. Search for “WPC Variations Table”, Install & Activate it
  4. Go to WPClever > Variations Table to change settings

sections.reviews:
Doesnt follow the stands of show_variations

By familyaffiliatehub on March 12, 2024

I wished it showed realtime pricing when selecting the variations, but another plugin does that but is incompatible because this plugin doesn't use show_variation . Such a shame and very frustrating. I give it 3 stars because this plugin does what it is suppose to.

Shame it doesn't follow the woocommerce standards tho..

Stock Quantity

By bmachars on January 16, 2024

Lacks the stock quantity option!

Top Plugin & Support

By harryf98 on February 24, 2023

The WPC Variations Table for WooCommerce is an excellent plugin that allows you to create custom tables for your WooCommerce product variations, making it easy for customers to compare different options side by side. This is particularly useful for stores that sell products with many variations. My experience with the support team was impressive. I had some inquiries about the plugin's functionality and customization capabilities, and the support team was prompt and supportive. In addition, they provided precise and detailed instructions and code snippets to enhance my experience.

Nice plugin & developer

By fromb on February 12, 2023

I've used other plugins for similar purposes but this one is very easy to use, even by clients who don't have much digital experience.

The developer is very quick to respond and even integrated a featured request I had in 2 days.

Highly recommended.

Great plugin and Fast support

By ducphamtien on February 23, 2022

The code quality is high, the author's service attitude is good
